WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 07 December 2024
A  Low-Pressure  area  is  likely  to  form  over  central  parts  of  south  Bay  of  Bengal  around  07th
December. The system is likely to move west-northwestwards and reach over southwest Bay of
Bengal off Sri-Lanka – Tamil Nadu coasts around 12th December.
Navel and fishing communities, engaging activities over South-west Bay of Bengal are requested
to be attentive to the future forecasts and bulletins issued by the Department of Meteorology
in this regards.
